articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Russian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Russian President
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of sympathy to Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on March 26 over the fire accident at a commercial centre in Kemerovo City of Russia that claimed huge casualties.
					 Kim Yong Nam in the message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the president and, through him, to the victims and the bereaved families.
					
					 He hoped that the sorrow of the bereaved families and the aftermath of the accident would be eradicated as early as possible to return the life to normal.

articles.title: DPRK Team Gets Qualification for 2019 AFC Asian Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Team Gets Qualification for 2019 AFC Asian Cup
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The second match between the DPRK team and Hong Kong team of China belonging to Group B for the 2019 AFC Asian Cup qualification was held at the Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, on Tuesday.
					 At the match, the DPRK team beat its rival 2:0.
					
					 Jong Il Gwan and Pak Kwang Ryong of the DPRK team scored at around 19 minutes and 25 minutes respectively.
					
					 The DPRK team recorded three wins, two draws and one lose in six matches of the Group B, getting the qualification for the 2019 AFC Asian Cup.

articles.title: DPRK Players Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Players Back Home
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK players returned home on Tuesday after taking part in the 11th FIG Artistic Gymnastics Individual Apparatus World Cup.

articles.title: Scientific Research Prize Awarded to Excellent University Students
articles.content:
Scientific Research Prize Awarded to Excellent University Students
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- In the DPRK university student scientific research prize was awarded to students who distinguished themselves in study and scientific researches.
					 A prize-awarding ceremony took place at the hall of the youth league on Tuesday.
					
					 The prize certificate and medal went to more than 680 students who have proved successful in study and made signal achievements in the science research group activities.

articles.title: Study Tour Group Passes Hyangsan
articles.content:
Study Tour Group Passes Hyangsan
Hyangsan, March 27 (KCNA) -- The group of schoolchildren from across the country, who is making a 250-mile journey for learning, passed through Hyangsan.
					 The members of the study tour group, who crossed Myongmun Pass on Mar. 24, continued their journey via Tongsin and Huichon through which President Kim Il Sung went keenly realizing the reality of the country groaning under the bayonets of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Officials of the local party and power organs and working people's organizations greeted the study tour makers and encouraged them, marching together with them.
					
					 The study tour makers dropped in at Chongwun Lodge and Huichon Inn Revolutionary Site to deeply grasp the revolutionary feats of the President who cherished a lofty idea to save the destiny of the country and the nation, making 250-mile journeys for learning and national liberation when he was young.
					
					 During a break they had a meeting to express their impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas and their compositions and danced and held a recreation party.
					
					 They arrived in Hyangsan Township on Mar. 26.
					
					 They were warmly welcomed by working people from all walks of life and school youth and children.
					
					 They placed a floral basket at the statue of the President in the township and made bows to him.
					
					 They left Hyangsan Township on Tuesday and are on march for Mangyongdae.

articles.title: New Movable Automatic Meteorological Observation Device Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Movable Automatic Meteorological Observation Device Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has directed big efforts to modernizing meteorological observation facilities.
					 The Hydro-meteorological Observation Instrument Factory under the State Hydro-meteorological Administration has recently made movable automatic meteorological observation device which is useful in ensuring quickness, correctness and scientific accuracy of hydro-meteorological data.
					
					 Ri Sung Chol, manager of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					 The new device makes it possible to automatically measure the atmospheric temperature and humidity, wind speed and direction, rainfall, sunshine duration and others in real time and send them to observatory by radio.
					
					 It makes meteorological observation according to observation indices like underground temperature and the amount of ground evaporation.
					
					 It has been introduced into more than 100 hydro-meteorological observatories. It can be used in various sectors of the national economy like aerial and marine transport and agriculture, and education units at all levels.

articles.title: DPRK's Efforts for Dialogue and Peace Win Support at Home and Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Efforts for Dialogue and Peace Win Support at Home and Abroad
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The public at home and abroad has highly appreciated the dramatic events taking place for the improvement of inter-Korean relations and peace on the Korean peninsula thanks to the DPRK's pro-active decision and positive efforts.
					 Margot Elisabeth Wallstrom, foreign minister of Sweden, said that what is clear is that the whole world is paying attention to the situation on the Korean peninsula. This reflects the interests of all of us in view of security, the minister said, adding that now is the time for dialogue.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article titled "Attraction of Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un", which said that his attraction is that he is a very trust-worthy man who doesn't make any empty talk, adding: His judgment is correct and he surely does whatever he is determined to do.
					
					 A senior researcher of the south Korean Security and Strategy Institute said at a seminar:
					
					 We can understand that the north has long prepared for the present turn of the situation, as evidenced by the facts that it stressed the "dialogue and improvement of the relations between the north and the south to settle the nuclear war crisis on the Korean peninsula" in a decision of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea in May 2016 and issued an "appeal to the whole Korean nation at home and abroad" in name of the joint meeting of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations on Jan. 24 in the wake of the New Year Address to make clear four points; making a breakthrough for improved north-south relations and independent reunification, easing the acute military tension between the north and the south, creating a peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula, realizing contacts, visits, wide-range cooperation and exchange between them, positively creating a climate for national reconciliation and reunification and paving the way for fresh phase of national reunification on the principle of national independence and under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Agreeing to such view, the south Korean online newspaper Tongil News contended that the north created the present situation with its strategic option to overcome the crisis on the Korean peninsula, neither seeking a turn of the situation as it could not stand the U.S.-led international sanctions nor considering the condition in which the United States was examining a military option against the north.
					
					 Various civic and social organizations of south Korea including the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, Solidarity for Social Progress and the Confederation of Trade Unions have hailed the present atmosphere for improved north-south relations through such colorful events as meeting and song performance in Seoul, Pusan, Taejon and other areas. They would say that it is hard to go to bed, deeply moved, and their hearts are swelling with pride and honor.
					
					 Posted on websites of south Korea are numerous articles under such titles as "We saw the possibility for peace and reunification free from war", "It is an unprecedented event", "Let us conclude a peace pact and freely come and go between the north and the south" and "We expect a successful dialogue".
					
					 The climate for reconciliation and detente is prevailing in the Korean peninsula where the situation was on the verge of war and the desire for peace and reunification is growing stronger. This reality makes the public at home and abroad keenly feel the DPRK's positive and sincere stance and efforts for the improved inter-Korean relations and peace on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Blasted for Lunacy
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Blasted for Lunacy
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Tuesday comments on the south Korean military's recent announcement that New OPLAN different from OPLAN 5015 targeted against the north was worked out. 
					 The paper says:
					
					 New OPLAN, the keynote of which is to "win war by taking the smallest toll in the shortest time," is aimed at completely neutralizing the leadership and strategic targets of the DPRK in a few hours through the aerial infiltration by special unit forces of the south Korean army, the sea infiltration by marine corps and missile attack by the task force brigade newly built under the missile command at the beginning of war.
					
					 To this end, the south Korean military is now examining a plan to secure more than 2 600 missiles of various missions earlier than the set time in a bid to "reduce the north to ashes" at the beginning of all-out war.
					
					 The massive arms build-up and military tension racket by the south Korean military are an extremely dangerous move as it openly revealed their intention to stand against the north by force of arms to the last like the conservative regime.
					
					 Dialogue and confrontation, peace and war can not go together.
					
					 Nevertheless, they are pursuing a sinister military confrontation under the eyes of the north, which clearly proves that they seek an ulterior aim while paying lip-service to the "dialogue" and "peace".
					
					 We declare that whoever misjudges our goodwill and tolerance and provokes us by force of arms is bound to face terrible ruin and merciless punishment.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Slovakia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Slovakia
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A Slovak preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed in Bratislava on March 17.
					 Ivan Draxler, chairman of the Slovak Association for Supporting and Studying the Juche Idea and chairman of the Slovakia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from March 20 to April 20 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and introducing the achievements made by the Korean people in building a powerful socialist country under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Uganda
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Uganda
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A Ugandan preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed in Kampala on March 19.
					 Kirunda Kivejinja, second deputy prime minister, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 At an inaugural ceremony of the preparatory committee the chairman underscored the need to highly praise Kim Il Sung as the father of socialist Korea and eternal leader of the Korean people, give wide publicity to his career and exploits through media and hold seminar, lecture, film show and other political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in DR Congo
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee of DR Congo for celebrating the Day of the Sun posted the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Hold the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung in High Esteem as the Eternal President of Our Republic" on the internet homepage of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on March 18 with the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung as an occasion.
					 The work, published on July 11 and 19, Juche 83 (1994), calls for holding the President in high esteem for all ages and sets forth the tasks for defending and creditably carrying forward his idea and exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Nigerian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Nigerian Body
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Attraction of Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un" on its website on Mar. 16.
					 The article said:
					
					 A politician can become a popular one and pursue successful politics only when he has good qualities and traits.
					
					 The Supreme Leader of the DPRK is drawing the interest of the international community as a very charismatic and popular statesman.
					
					 Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is a very strong leader.
					
					 The stance and resolute decisions shown by him in recent years' standoff with the U.S. help one grasp his strong disposition.
					
					 Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is also tender-hearted while being strong.
					
					 He is very kind and open-minded to the people. He always bows to people's salutation and unreservedly talks in whispers with them with a smile on his face at all times.
					
					 His attraction is that he is a very trust-worthy man who doesn't make any empty talk.
					
					 His judgment is correct and he surely does whatever he is determined to do.
					
					 The Korean people are firmly convinced that they are sure to win as they are led by him.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias a Putin
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias a Putin
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 26 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, en relacion con que se reportaron muchas perdidas humanas en el incendio de un centro comercial en la ciudad rusa de Kemerovo.
					En su misiva, el remitente expreso al destinatario profunda compasion y condolencias que hizo extensivas a las victimas y sus familiares.
					
					Deseo con sinceridad que se eliminen cuanto antes la tristeza de los familiares de victimas y los danos causados y llegue la estabilidad.

articles.title: RPDC gana el boleto a la Copa Asiatica de CAF 2019
articles.content:
RPDC gana el boleto a la Copa Asiatica de CAF 2019
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 27 en el capitalino Estadio Kim Il Sung el segundo juego entre el equipo coreano y el de Hong Kong de China, pertenecientes a la llave B de las clasificatorias finales de la Copa Asiatica de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol (CAF) 2019.
					En ese partido que puso punto final a las clasificatorias, el equipo anfitrion vencio al visitante por 2:0. 
					
					Jong Il Gwan marco el primer gol a los minutos 19 y Pak Kwang Ryong repitio la anotacion a los minutos 25. 
					
					Asi la RPDC se ha clasificado al susodicho evento al registrar 3 victorias, 2 empates y una derrota en 6 partidos jugados de su zona.

articles.title: Apoyan dentro y fuera del pais los esfuerzos de la RPDC por dialogo y paz
articles.content:
Apoyan dentro y fuera del pais los esfuerzos de la RPDC por dialogo y paz
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- Todo el mundo aprecia los acontecimientos dramaticos favorables a la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y a la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, preparados por la iniciativa y esfuerzos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					La cancillera sueca Margot Elisabeth Wallstrom dijo que lo mas evidente es que todo el mundo esta atento a la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y agrego que esto representa los intereses de todos en el aspecto de seguridad y ahora es cuando hace falta el dialogo. 
					
					El Comite Nacional Nigeriano de Estudio de Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo publico en su pagina web el articulo intitulado "Encanto del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un". 
					
					El texto senala que el encanto del lider coreano esta en que es un hombre digno de confianza que no dice palabras hueras y tiene el juicio correcto y cumple todo lo decidido. 
					
					En un seminario, el investigador-jefe del Instituto de Seguridad y Estrategia del Sur de Corea explico como sigue:
					
					El Norte de Corea enfatizo en la resolucion del VII Congreso del Partido, abierto en mayo de 2016, la necesidad de "abrir el dialogo y mejorar las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas para aliviar la crisis de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana". Y en el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo y en el "llamamiento enviado a toda la nacion dentro y fuera del pais", emitido el 24 de enero pasado en nombre de la reunion conjunta del gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, insistio en 4 puntos, o sea, abrir la brecha en la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion independiente, aliviar la aguda tension militar Norte-Sur y preparar el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana, lograr contactos, viajes, amplia cooperacion e intercambio y preparar el ambiente favorable a la reconciliacion nacional y a la reunificacion y dar nueva coyuntura de reunificacion de la patria bajo la bandera de la independencia nacional y de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales". 
					
					Estos hechos muestran que el Norte vino preparando desde hace mucho tiempo la actual coyuntura de viraje. 
					
					Al respecto, el periodico online surcoreano Tongil News comento que el Norte intenta cambiar la situacion no por su impotencia de resistir la sancion de la sociedad internacional bajo el mando de EE.UU. ni por la revision de la opcion militar por parte de este pais, sino eso es la opcion estrategica para superar la crisis de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					El Comite Sureno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, la Solidaridad por el Progreso Social, la Confederacion de Sindicatos y otras entidades civiles y sociales del Sur de Corea montan en Seul, Pusan, Taejon y otras localidades las escenas de discursos de apoyo, las funciones de cancion y otras actividades expresando que "no pueden dormir por la emocion excesiva" y "estan llenos de orgullo". 
					
					Se leen en los sitios web surcoreanos las siguientes palabras: "Vimos la posibilidad de lograr la paz y la reunificacion", "Impacto nunca visto", "Firmemos el convenio de paz y posibilitemos el viaje libre al Norte y al Sur" y "Esperamos la marcha exitosa del dialogo". 
					
					Viendo la realidad de hoy en que se aumenta la aspiracion a la paz y reunificacion y se prepara el ambiente de reconciliacion y distension en la Peninsula Coreana que se encontraba en la crisis de guerra, los nacionales y los extranjeros se simpatizan con la posicion y esfuerzos sinceros de la RPDC por el mejoramiento de las relaciones Norte-Sur y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena nuevo plan operacional trazado por el circulo militar surcoreano
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena nuevo plan operacional trazado por el circulo militar surcoreano
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- En estos dias, la capa militar surcoreana dice abiertamente que ha completado el "nuevo OPLAN", aparte del "OPLAN 5015" para la agresion al Norte de Corea.
					El nuevo plan, consistente en alcanzar la "victoria en la guerra en el tiempo mas corto y con bajas minimas", tiene el objetivo de neutralizar completamente dentro de unas horas la Direccion Suprema y los blancos estrategicos de la RPDC mediante la infiltracion aerea de las tropas especiales y la maritima de las fuerzas navales y el ataque de misiles de la brigada de ataque, fundada recientemente en la comandancia de misil, a comienzos de la guerra.  
					
					Al respecto, el periodico Minju Joson publico hoy un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					Para ese fin, la militar surcoreana esta examinando el proyecto de disponerse pronto de mas de 2 mil 600 misiles de diferentes tipos necesarios para "devastar al Norte de Corea" al principio de la guerra total.
					
					El aumento armamentista de ella y sus movimientos en busca de la tension militar resultan extremadamente peligrosos porque exponen su voluntad de enfrentarse hasta el final con la parte connacional por via militar, al igual que en el "poder" conservador.
					
					El dialogo y la paz son incompatibles con el enfrentamiento y la guerra.
					
					Los hechos insinuan que ellos persiguen el enfrentamiento militar aunque hablan del "dialogo" y la "paz".
					
					A decir en claro, sufrira la destruccion irreparable y el castigo implacable el que trate de probar con la fuerza a la RPDC juzgando mal su buena fe e indulgencia.
